The algorithm learns the patterns and characteristics of the mass spectra associated with bioaerosols, phosphorus-bearing mineral dust, and phosphorus-rich combustion by-products such as fly ash. This training allows the algorithm to differentiate and identify bioaerosols based on their unique spectral features.
